name: Volkolak
description:
After receving invitation to your late grandfather funeral, you drive to childhood village. But as you arrived at your old place, you discover emptyness, horror and danger. Will you fell victim to the creature of ancient legend, or will you prevail, by obtaining 3 sacred symbols?

Anotation: Since English isn't my native language, translation maybe rough. This game was made by 3 people - Me and my 2 friends. We will continue working on this project, making it a proper survival horror game.

Credits:

Sound Effects - Survival I by Darkworld Audio

KeyMap:

WASD - Walking

L. Shift - Sprint

L. Ctrl - crouch

E - Interact

R - Reload, Exit from reading

LMB - Shoot
